label: Plan
description: Strategy as a conscious, structured plan to achieve goals. Deliberate and analytical in nature.

label: Pattern
description: Strategy as a pattern in a stream of actions â€” not necessarily intended, but visible in hindsight.

label: Position
description: Strategy as the place or niche the organization occupies in the external environment.

label: Perspective
description: Strategy as a deeply embedded worldview or shared mindset that shapes actions.

label: Ploy
description: Strategy as a specific maneuver or tactical action to outwit competitors.
